Get the stop time of the current Event

Returns:

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The event name

# (Number) getOrigin()

Get the origin time of the current Event

Returns:

  • ( Number ) — The origin of the event (the starting time of the event)

# (Number) getEndTime()

Get the last time of the last period of the event

Returns:

  • ( Number ) — The end time of the event

# (Number) getDurationPeriods()

Get the periods duration

Returns:

  • ( Number ) — The duration of every periods of the event

# (Number) getDuration()

Get the event duration

Returns:

  • ( Number ) — The global duration from start to stop

# (String) getCategory()

Get the category

Returns:

  • ( String ) — The category of the event

Get the Period list of the event

Returns:

  • ( Period ) — The periods of the event

# (void) setPeriod()

Create a new period from the previous period end time (origin if no periods before
